name: Encrypt Image Tags within the_content() area
author: Marirs

sections.description: This will ensure that the audience of your site will not see the actual image source/filename. This in one way will just deter an user from stealing your image. However, internet savvy people will be somehow able to still reverse engineer the scrambled script to recover the filename. Security is never 100% ðŸ˜‰ Hope this plugin will be of some use to others too.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘encrypt-img-tag.php to the /wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done

short_description: This plugin for wordpress will encrypt/scramble all the tags within the post generated from the_content.
description: This will ensure that the audience of your site will not see the actual image source/filename. This in one way will just deter an user from stealing your image. However, internet savvy people will be somehow able to still reverse engineer the scrambled script to recover the filename. Security is never 100% ðŸ˜‰ Hope this plugin will be of some use to others too.
